column1: Docling provides an easy code interface to convert PDF documents from file system, URLs or binary

streams, and retrieve the output
in either JSON or Markdown format.
methods are offered to convert single documents or batches of documents. A basic usage example
is illustrated below. Further examples are available in the Doclign code repository.

from
docling . docum en t_converter
import

source
